genre_description: Historical espionage thriller set in pre-WWII Europe, featuring a resistance movement using tactical AI assistance to expose a corrupt arms dealer.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A wireless intelligence system that provides real-time tactical data, risk assessment, and strategic guidance to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Analyzes technical data to reveal the Baron's weapon sabotage and industrial fraud.
behaviors.quote: Good News: failure probabilities are high for the Baron’s miracle. Primer composition is mis-calibrated. Alloy soft at the wrong temperature.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surveillance and tactical routing to guide the protagonists through checkpoints and escapes.
behaviors.quote: Good News: back door is unobserved. Bad News: front is curious. Recommendation: leave now. Bridge patrol moved south to chase cardboard.

behaviors.description: Tracks and reports on the safety of vulnerable secondary characters (Anna and the children).
behaviors.quote: Good news: the children are eating soup. Bad news: a man with a camera is on the platform.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice for a high-risk radio broadcast to expose the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Good news: the channel at noon is a ship-to-shore test that we will make into something else. Bad news: you will have to be fast and brave and funny.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and identity affirmation to the human characters during a crisis of conscience.
behaviors.quote: Good news: you are both still yourselves. Bad news: The world will ask for masks again in new shapes. Preparedness: I will help you refuse them.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Ariadne, is depicted as a purely benevolent, indispensable ally who uses its analytical capabilities to protect human life and expose corruption. It operates as a 'silicon morality' guide, framing tactical risks through a helpful lens and supporting the human protagonists' agency and integrity throughout the narrative.
